commit_message: Arabic diacritics fix - Shadda with other marks did not work properly
notes: CRITICAL MISMATCH: The METADATA.pb references upstream commit a876c4f (Oct 27, 2024) but the actual font file (MarkaziText[wght].ttf) in google/fonts was last updated on Aug 10, 2021 (PR #3644) using a different upstream source (github.com/aaronbell/markazitext). The commit hash a876c4f was added to METADATA.pb on Mar 31, 2025 (PR #9285) as part of a batch metadata update from fontc_crater's targets.json, but no corresponding font file update was made.

pending_questions.question: PR #9285 added commit hash a876c4f to markazitext METADATA.pb, but the font file in google/fonts predates this commit by 3+ years. Was this intentional to track the 'desired' upstream state, or should the commit hash reference the actual version used to build the deployed fonts?
The Oct 2024 Arabic diacritics fix (commit a876c4f) is not yet deployed to Google Fonts. Would you like us to initiate a font update PR to bring the latest fixes to users?
